reviews.review: Fun single player puzzle. But co-op with my sister? not as much as the fighting.
the game is out much long time but great none the less

One of the greatest games of all time and for good reasons, if you haven't played it already stop reading this and just go play it! :)
what can i say, other than another valve classic
Absolutely love this game, story goes well with gameplay, overall one of the best singleplayer games i've ever played

One of the best videogames I have ever played, it's got good story, lovable characters, funny humor, amazing gameplay and great puzzles. I would 100% recommend this game if you don't know what to play.
The best puzzle game i have played to date. its perfectly mixes fun game play with an engaging story and actual difficult puzzles which are still solvable. Incredible game!

This game is one of, if not the best game I've ever played. The story and the humour were amazing. Some passages of gameplay felt a little annoying, but overall, cube and button testing is what I would gladly do for living.
Even after tons of times playing it over the years its amazing 100% worth playing.
Love this game [spoiler]to the moon and back[/spoiler].

Highly recommend this game!

Got into gaming a few years ago when I met my husband. Early in our relationship he played through 1 and 2 while I watched to try and get me into gaming. Finally played and beat Portal and Portal 2. Officially one of my favorite games. The characters are wonderful. I was absolutely stumped and subsequently pissed at myself with many of the puzzles. Just wonderful.
Well, after 18 hours and a friend joining me I have officially beaten every level, including co-op and extras. Pretty good, would recommend if you're still on edge of buying it.
